article: A strange thing happened to Henry yesterday. He was on a bus and to  got off  . So he stood up and rang the bell.  _  make sure the driver heard him, he rang it twice, but the bus  _  stop. And the conductor came and shouted  _  him. The conductor was  _  angry and spoke  so  fast that Henry didn't understand  a word  . The bus stopped at the next bus and Henry got off. As he got off he heard someone said, -- "I think he  _  a foreigner." When Henry got  home  , he told his wife about it. -- "  How many  times did you ring the bell?" his wife asked. --" Twice," said Henry. -- "Well, that's the signal  _  the driver  to go  on."||His wife explained, --"only the conductor  is allowed  to ring the bell twice. That's why the conductor  got  so angry! " Henry nodded . -- "  I see  , "he said.
